items_into_drawer.41838: Put the wooden cutlery in the open drawer

wipe_stove_with_towel/cloth.59790: Use the pink towel to wipe the buttons on the stove
wipe_stove_with_towel/cloth.88760: Pick up the pink cloth and wipe the bottom left cooker on the stove, put the pick cloth black onto the borehole

move_and_wipe_pot.49026: Slide the silver pot to the top right cooker on the hob of the stove, pick up the purple cloth and wipe the bottom right cooker on the hob of the stove, put the purple cloth back on the job of the stove
